name: Video Streaming Scoring
description: Scoring template for Video Streaming super-sector patents. Includes streaming protocol relevance, codec efficiency, and CDN/delivery metrics.

questions.question: How relevant is this patent to streaming protocols and standards (HLS, DASH, CMAF, WebRTC, RTMP, etc.)? Consider standard essentiality and widespread adoption potential.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant streaming protocols and standards, and explain how essential this patent might be to their implementation.

questions.question: How does this patent relate to video codecs and compression (H.264/AVC, H.265/HEVC, VP9, AV1, VVC)? Rate its compression efficiency improvements or codec relevance.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify codec technologies involved and describe compression or quality improvements.

questions.question: How does this patent address video delivery challenges? Consider CDN optimization, adaptive bitrate, edge computing, caching, and large-scale distribution.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe delivery optimizations and scalability benefits.

questions.question: How does this patent improve the end-user streaming experience? Consider latency reduction, quality of experience (QoE), buffering prevention, and playback smoothness.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe user experience improvements and their measurable impact.
